filterdb 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Compute univariate scores of predictors

    importance_metrics.Rd

    Compute univariate scores of predictors

    importance_metrics(x, y, methods, opts = list())

    Arguments

    x

    A data frame of predictors.

    y

    A data frame with a single outcome column.

    methods

    A character string of available scores. See filter_methods().

    A

    named list of options for the chosen methods.

    Value

    An object with class importance_metrics. The elements are values (a list of data frames of scores) and info (a list with the details of each method).

    Examples

    if (rlang::is_installed(c("dplyr", "modeldata"))) {
  library(dplyr)
  library(modeldata)

  ames_scores <-
    importance_metrics(
      ames %>% select(-Sale_Price),
      y = ames %>% select(Sale_Price),
      methods = c("corr")
    )

  ames_scores
}
